Chronoi apykatastaseōz panton, or, The times of restitution of all things with their neer approach upon the ruine of the beast : manifest by two tracts on Rev. 20.5 & Rev. 21.5 containing the main scope of all Revelation prophecie ... : which said two last tracts may fitly be entituled An alarm to this present world ... / by William Sherwin. Sherwin, William, 1607-1687?
[2], 81 p. : port.
[s.n.], London : 1675.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
